body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to us today. My name is Joseph Coleman and I work for Speedy Cars Inc. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Joseph, my name is Kimberly Rivera.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kimberly. Can you please provide me with your phone number, starting with the area code, so I can assist you further?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my number is five five five, three two one, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kimberly. Can you also confirm your email address so we can keep you updated regarding our services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is kimberly.rivera@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for sharing that information, Kimberly. Is there anything specific you need help with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling surprised about the data management at your Car Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand your concern, Kimberly. We'll address the data management issue promptly. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Kimberly. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Joseph. Have a great day too.
